mapper.insert: insert into spring_user (user_id, user_name, real_name, phone_number, gender, birthday, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update spring_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
